monogr.title: A Digital Dictionary of Shawi Arabic

prefixDef.p: Private URIs using the teiCorpusHeader prefix are pointers to any element in the SHAWI teiCorpus document.
Private URIs using the share prefix are pointers to audio file residing on the SHAWI network share.
Private URIs using the geo prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a place element in VICAV Geodata list.
Private URIs using the zotid prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a biblStruct element in the TEI export of the VICAV Zotero Group library.
Private URIs using the dict prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a entry in the SHAWI glossary.
Private URIs using the rend prefix are pointers to the xml:id attribute on a rendition element in VICAV rendition library.

spanGrp.span: The Kurd(s), may God give you a long life master Stephan, in Siverek, next to Siverek.
We have Kurds there; once a Kurd in a village was married to two women.
He had two wives, a young and an older one. His financial situation was a little bit weak, let’s say, like mine.
He did not have much money; he came back home in the evening and he went out
herding (animals); he was a shepherd or whatever, I do not know what. Once, when he came back home, one of his wives said, “My dress is old, I want a dress.”
He went to the other one and she said, “My hair, look how my hair is! There are lice in it. Take me to the hairdresser [to the tailor]!” To the hairdresser, I guess.
“So he can see my hair and I can comb my hair again. He should check my hair and look what’s wrong with it.”
They came up with all kinds of excuses, but he didn’t say anything to them. And one day, because of stress, he even began to not do it.
He did not wash and he did not have sex with them. He had no desire for the bed.
However, one evening he prepared himself for them and said (to himself), “Hold on! Today I am going to show them!”
He put one in this room and the other in that room and said, “Don’t go out!”
He went inside to the young one and screwed her, he fucked her. He went out and went inside to the older one. And so he kept on doing until the morning: fucking and fucking, fucking and fucking.
He did not stop. He did not let them take a breath.
In the morning they got up and washed themselves; he also washed himself and said,
“Let’s go to the …! Didn’t you want to go to the hairdresser? To the tailor?
I’d like to buy you clothes. Here you are, take some money!”
The older one said, “I do not want any clothes anymore. My current clothes are enough for me. I already have clothes.”
When he came to the young one he said, “Come on, didn’t you want to go to the tailor (recte hairdresser) to have a makeup and stuff?”
She said, “No, my husband. Now I will find myself a comb from here and comb my hair.”

He looked at his penis like this: ptooey! He looked at his penis, spitted on it and said, “O you son of a dog, you are both a tailor and a hairdresser! Today you have become both a hairdresser and a tailor!” Hahaha! Enjoy it!
